Articles.Content:
Well, Hi.

I've been watching the posts on this forum for a few months now but hadn't actively started posting until now. So i guess i'm half new?

"Houston, Apollo 11 . . . I've got the world in my window.

- Michael Collins

Edited October 3, 2012 by Mars90000000

Hi Mars90000000, welcome to the welcome aboard board

Now go launch some rockets!

Half-welcome to the forums Mars90000000 (Long name, and I've been playing games with you, remember?)

Houston, check out my Space Exploration Discussion Thread in Off-Topic for discussion (duh?) and upcoming launches.

Have fun playing KSP and on here and go blow up some rockets!
